name: XOXO
description:
Can you mine enough asteroids to earn a nice holidays on the shores of mars? Just try not to die while trying.

2018 Global Game Jam project developed by: lunafromthemoon (me), rumpel, miss leno, chrismann eins, cons kamikaze, sergio niño, andres stazzoni and soledad yucra in La Plata, Argentina.
